title: Kreator - Terrible Certainty 1987 (bonus tracks) [EAC-FLAC]
description:
KREATOR - Terrible Certainty (1987). Reissue with remastered sound and "Out of the Dark...into the Light" EP as bonus tracks.

1. Blind Faith
2. Storming with Menace
3. Terrible Certainty
4. As the World Burns
5. Toxic Trace
6. No Escape
7. One of Us
8. Behind the Mirror

bonus tracks:

9. Impossible to Cure
10. Lambs to the Slaughter (Raven cover)
11. Terrible Certainty (Live)
12. Riot of Violence (Live)
13. Awakening of the Gods (Live)

ENJOY!
